text:
Yes. Hoo. I am going to win. Oh no! No! No!
Ooh. Game over. Oh, Hello boys and girls.

I am playing computer games. Do you like playing
computer games? I do.

Hey! What was that? There it was again. Oh!
Look! What is it? Wow! It’s a robot! Yeah!

AU! Oh. I think that was a ball. What’s
going on? Oh! Look at this mess! Who made

this mess? Oh. What can you see? Look, I can
see – a ball and a toy car, a toy train,

a robot, a dinosaur, a doll. Ohh, what a mess.
And there are more toys coming from over there.

Oh no, a ball!
A doll!

A dinosaur!
A robot!

A plane!
A teddy bear!

Oh o, LEGO. Oh no. Great.
Come on, let’s find out what’s going on.

Ohh… Oh look, there’s a car. And another
ball. It must be Maggie making this mess.

MAGGIE!
No! Oh! What was that? Haha!

Hey Steve, what are you doing on the floor?
Are you sleeping? Hihi!

Sleeping? Sleeping?! NO! I am not sleeping.
I fell over on your ball.

Oh-o.
Oh, Maggie, look at all of this. Look. What

is it?
A toy shop. Hihi.

NO, Maggie! It’s a mess. Oh. I mean look.
Look here. Hey, what is it? What is it? Help

me. Tell Maggie. What is it? Yeah! It’s
a teddy bear. And Maggie look, what’s this?

What is it? Tell Maggie. What is it? It’s
a doll. And over here. What’s this Maggie?

What is it? Tell Maggie. Come on. What is
it? YEAH! It’s a car. A toy car. Yeah. And

over here. Look. Look. What’s this? What
is it? Oh-o. What is it Maggie? Help me, tell

her. What is it? Yeah, it’s a train. A toy
train. Just look at this mess. Oh Maggie,

what are you doing?
I am looking for my pencil case. Your pencil

case?
Yeah!

Oh Maggie. I think your pencil case is in
my wardrobe. Aha! Oh…

What a naughty, naughty bird.
Hey, I hope your bedroom isn’t so messy

with toys everywhere. You should tidy up.
Let’s see if Maggie has found her pencil

case.
Maggie! Have you found your pencil case? Oh,

hey! Maggie! No! No! No! Stop it! Oh, you
naughty naughty bird.
It’s Steve and Maggie.

Hello boys and girls. Hi. We are playing with
some toys. Yeah! Look, Maggie is playing with

the blocks. Say hello Maggie.
Hello! Hello! Haha.

Uuh, what´s that? Look, a toy train.
Yeah! Wow! Hey, if I was small I could drive

the toy train.
OK, Steve. Abracadabra!

Hihi. Thanks, Maggie. Wow. Look, I am so small.
And look at the toy train. Come on, let´s

drive the train! Yeah!
Yeah! Look at my toy train. Wow! Come on,

let´s go! Yeah!
Hello, look at me! Oh no! Steve! Look out!

Look out! Oh no! Stop!
Oh dear! Oh, hey. Oh, what is it? Look. What´s

that? Yeah, it´s a block. Say with me – It´s
a block. It´s a block. Now say it like this.

Say. It´s a block. Come on, are you ready?
It´s a block. It´s a block. And again. It´s

a block. Yeah! But what color is it? It´s
yellow. Yeah! It´s a yellow block. Maggie,

move the yellow block, please.
OK! Thank you! Yeah! So, come on. Let´s go.

Yeah!
This is great! Oh no! Stop the train! Oh not

again! Steve! Stop! Stop! Stop!
Hey. What´s that? Look, what is it? What

is it? Oh, look! It´s Lego. Yeah! Say with
me. Are you ready? It´s Lego. It´s Lego.

It´s Lego. Come on! It´s Lego. It´s Lego.
One last time. It´s Lego. Yeah! But look.

What color is it? Yeah. It´s blue. It´s
blue Lego.

Move the blue Lego please Maggie! OK! Thank
you! Ok, come on. Yeah! Let´s go again. Yeah!

This is fun!
Oh. Steve, be careful! Oh no! Stop the train!

What is it now? Look, it´s a green yo-yo.
Wow! I like yo-yos! I am going to play with
the green yo-yo. Hey.
It’s Steve and Maggie.

Hello boys and girls. Let's go and see Maggie.
Wonder what she's doing.

Hello Maggie. What are you doing today?
Hello, hello Steve. I am learning to read

at school.
That's great.

Read, read, reading at school. Reading at
school. Well, that's cool.

Hey, hey Maggie. What are you doing now?
Hello, hello Steve. I am learning to write

at school.
That's super.

Write, write, writing at school. Writing at
school. Well, that's cool.

Now I can read and write.
Hello Maggie. What are you doing today?

Hello, hello Steve. I am learning to listen
at school.

That's great.
Listen, listening at school, listening at

school. Well, that's cool.
Hey, hey Maggie. What are you doing now?

Hello, hello Steve. I am learning to count
at school.

Oh super.
Count, count, counting at school. Counting

at school. Well, that's cool.
Now, I can listen and count.

Hello Maggie. What are you doing today?
Hello, hello Steve. I am learning to speak

English.
That's great.

Speak, speak, speaking English. Speaking English.
Well, that's cool.

So, can you speak English?
I can speak English.
Let's all speak English. Yeah.
It's Steve and Maggie.

Hi. Hello! I am hungry so I am looking for
something to eat or drink. Let´s have a look

in my fridge. This is my fridge. Hmm… but…
hmmm… I don´t want anything from here because

I looked in Maggie´s fridge and she´s got
some yoghurt. Some strawberry yoghurt.

Look! Yoghurt! I like yoghurt. Should I eat
some of Maggie´s yoghurt? Yes? No. Yes? No.

Yes? Ok, but just a little. Yoghurt, yummy!
It´s delicious. Do you like yoghurt? I like

yoghurt. Yummy! So hey, what is it? It´s
yoghurt. I like yoghurt. Oh hey! Look, what´s

this? What is it? What is it? Yeah! It´s
chocolate! I like chocolate. No, it´s Maggie´s

chocolate. Maggie´s chocolate. Oh, but I
really like chocolate. No, Steve, no! It´s

not my chocolate. No. No. Say with me and
jump along. What is it? It´s chocolate. Ok,

maybe just a little.
Steve! Steve!

Oh no! Maggie´s coming.
Steve! Steve! Oh, where is Steve? Cheese!

I like cheese.
Hello! Look, it´s Steve´s cheese. Hmm. Delicious.

I like cheese. I´m going to eat just a little.
Yummy. Cheese.

Hey, what´s Maggie eating? What is it? It´s
cheese. It´s my cheese!

Hey, what´s that? Is it Steve? No. Look,
milk. Haha! I like milk. Yeah!

Hey, what´s Maggie drinking now? What is
it? Oh, it´s milk. It´s my milk!

Hey Steve! What are you doing?
What are you doing?!

Sorry, Steve. I´m drinking your milk and
eating your cheese.

That´s ok Maggie because I´m eating your
chocolate…

Hey!
… and your yoghurt.

We are silly.
Yes and a little naughty. Maggie, you naughty,

naughty bird.
Naughty, naughty Steve.

Yeah. See you next time.
Bye-bye.

Bye for now
Bye-bye.

Heyyyy. Hey. Did you like that? Yeah? Then
please like it, if you love it, you can subscribe.

Yeah. Thank you.
